summary: The Astronaut Safe Temporary Ride Options Act (ASTRO Act) aims to authorize transportation for federal officers and employees returning from space for medical or official duties before they receive medical clearance to drive. It amends Title 31 of the United States Code.  The bill mandates NASA to report annually to relevant House and Senate committees on the transportation provided, including details of the officers/employees transported, costs, and the total number of instances. The bill also explicitly states that no additional funding is authorized.
